dictionary.lore: A standard shield used by soldiers of the Titan race. Tailored for the Titans, the size and weight of it is extraordinary. Though normal humans aren't able to hold it, its thick armor is said to be able to block even powerful attacks from the Titans, and would prove to be a valuable asset on the battlefield if only one could actually wield it. Records of the Giant Shield can be found in the historical archives of the Titan race.
